name: Can You Save The World ?
description:
Go through a city while social distancing, and save millions of lives !
Have fun while giving a hand in our current crisis.

               

MOVE with ARROW KEYS

Stay out of people's INFECTIOUS RADIUS to save more and more lives

Collect MASKS and leave them on CHECKPOINTS to gain even more lives

Collect POWER-UPS to gain HP and special effects !

If you save 7.000.000.000 people, you win. Can you save the world ?

Can You Save The World ? is a collaborative project between Prof. Richard Wiseman and developer Martin Jacob.

It is a family-friendly educational game to help face the Coronavirus pandemic.

Players of all ages can become better at social distancing through playing !

_______________

Richard Wiseman
is a Professor of the Public Understanding of Psychology at the University of Hertfordshire.

He has written several best-selling psychology books, and is the creator of the youtube channel "Quirkology".
